website_summaries.verdict: And all-around excellent shorty wetsuit that will keep you warm, toasty, and comfortable as you surf, snorkel, or swim all day long.
pros: Available in multiple sizes, small to XXXL
Super sealed neckline prevents water seepage
cons: Prices may vary wildly depending on your desired size and color combination

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. I am 6
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. I am 6;4" and weigh 270 lbs. Bought a XXXL and everything fit properly except for the arm/shoulders. The suit is put on easily and the zipper is strong and has a nice long string. The velcro on the neck is also large and strong. The problem was the bunching on the arm/shoulder/arm pit area. I by no means have twiggy arms but for some reason they must think a XXXL person must have logs for arms... That alone brought it to 4 stars for me, others it's a 5 star suit.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Follow the Sizing guide
customer_reviews.text: I'll start with the fact that mine fit perfectly! They don't run big or small, they run what they say they do! That being said, I'm 5'10" and 190 lbs and the large fit just right. It's a pretty decent quality neoprene suit! It worked well for what I need it for, working in pools during colder weather. Take care of your suit by hang drying it inside out overnight and it'll last a lot longer! When you store it, fold it in half and hang it like you would a pair of pants, not like a shirt! Super happy with my purchase! It definitely met my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Love it - fits great, feels great, looks great, easy on
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to wetsuits, but here's my opinion. I'm 5' 11" 165 lbs, semi-athletic in my 40s. This thing fits me like a glove and looks great. The red accents look really sharp, and the tailoring is excellent. Feels very solid, well proportioned for my frame, and is quite comfortable most everywhere. It is a bit tight in the arms, probably assuming most surfers and paddle-boarders are more toned than muscular. If you have big arms, I'd suggest a larger size. All in all for the price it's a steal. I paid full price. I was not provided a free sample or discount. I just like it. I'll update after hitting the water.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you Warm!
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this to run a Spartan Race in during the winter. He needed it! It was raining, 44 degrees, and windy. This thing worked beautifully for him. He says he was not cold during the whole race and he did not get cold until he took it off to shower and change clothes. The walk back to the car when he was not wearing it was worse than the whole race! It held up well and washed out clean.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M.

customer_reviews.title: good for swimming in swimming pools
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit takes out about 90% of the cold bite when getting into a swimming pool. It also keeps the sun off of you. I swim laps in an outdoor pool with this on, it doesn't constrict my shoulders hardly at all. Now, it is NOT 100% watertight. A trick of water does run inside, up the back particularly. But trapped between the wetsuit and you body, the water warms up quickly. Again, it's effective for a comfortably getting into a cool swimming pool, but probably not for a freezing ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sailing, Wind surfing, Kite surfing
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it was intended for. Keeps me warm, but not hot when the water temp is low (70's), helps ward off the cold spray. Wore it today water 70 degrees air 79 degrees, 10-12 mph winds, no issues, nice and warm, did not "sweat". I purchased a size larger than normal as my regular wetsuit is a beast to put on and off, this one is easy to put on, easy to take off when soaking wet.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I bought this for travel and tropical ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought this for travel and tropical diving and the material and workmanship is great. Initially, based on reviews, I ordered a size larger than what i normally wear. I am 6'4", 180lb, and in shape, so the size XL was loose on me. I exchanged it for a L and it fits me perfect! For those who are in standard sizes and athletic shape, this sizes are true. I hope this helps the next buyer
customer_reviews.author: RTS

customer_reviews.title: Are you built like me? Read this first!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Built with quality materials. Looks athletic and stylish. Seams are strong and cut well. Priced very nicely. Cons: Sizing was off for me. I am 5'8 163 pounds. Waist is 32", chest is 41". I have a muscular physique at 9% body fat. I ordered a medium based off the sizing chart. The medium is too tight around my biceps, shoulders and thighs. I am able to tolerate the tightness for 2 hours then I take the suit off. I think for me a large would fit better but might be a little long and loose in the waist but more comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Rockland

customer_reviews.title: I was able to stay in the water all day and felt absolutely perfect. I am now a wet suit convert and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was in San Diego in October and the water temperature was around 68F. I was able to stay in the water all day and felt absolutely perfect. I am now a wet suit convert and likely will venture into the water more often during winter seasons.I am not sure of the durability, but it worked perfectly for me. As far as fit, I am 6FT 175lbs and the Large fit me perfectly. At first, I thought it was too tight but when I moved around it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: The Grier Family

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece for moderate temp
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Ordered L. Im 6'2" 170lbs, thin build and it fit perfect. Went white water rafting in WA. Ambient was about 55F, water was about 45F. I did also have a fleece and a water jacket on, but I was much warmer than everyone else that used the full body rental wetsuits. Everyone else's lips were blue and I was good. I attribute this mostly to the fleece, but this thing is great for moderate temp outings. We also went surfing on the coast. Ambient was about 50f and water was also about ~55f. This would not work for full submersion in cold water. I wore a rental full body with boots and hat, and still froze, FYI.
customer_reviews.author: jpn

customer_reviews.title: 6’ 3” and 230 pounds, XX-Large fits me perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’ 3” and 230 pounds, tall and mostly thin except for a bit of a “man belly” as you would expect of a 55 year old man (38” waist). I ordered the XX-Large and this suit fits me perfectly. Very comfortable and kept me warm in 69 degree water. It appears to be very well made, but I’ve only used it once so I can’t speak as to how it will hold up over time. For the money you can’t go wrong. The only negative for me is that I don’t like the way the gripper stuff looks on the back of the suit where your butt and legs are.
customer_reviews.author: dob5280

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Casual Use
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well designed piece that kept my son warm in the water while he boogie boarded and swam in the ocean. My son is 6'1" and about 240. He fit well in this, and it was comfortable and loose with his very broad shoulders and thick legs. The back zipper worked great, super functional and very easy to zip and unzip. It looked terrific on him, too - not that he's vain, but :-). I am glad I brought this for his holiday gift and he used it so much it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: So 3XL fits a 6'0" person that's ~256 lbs. Might be a tad snug in the shoulders, but not enough to not wear it. I finally used it last night after purchasing it for a trip last summer. Never wore it on the trip as the water was 85 degrees at depth. (Love some Grand Cayman diving). This is a great value for ~$60 I would buy one again. I did buy the full suit but it didn't seem to fit the same so it was returned. YMMV
customer_reviews.author: mdisher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase !! By the table my size would be medium. However, I needed a more loose clothing, to fish at night, so I decided to take the large size. It looked good, but a little loose on the waist and leg. Was exactly what I was looking for. If you want this weltsuit for swimming or diving, it has to stay tight on the body. Soon you will have to buy the size specified by the manufacturer. I have 1.73 m and 72 kg.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shorty !
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I jet ski and have used the wetsuits a couple times but we're both TOTALLY IMPRESSED! We've used some older Mobey's and Jet Pilot suits over the years but we both agree, for the money, these are GREAT !!!! Very comfortable, very warm. We thought they were a 3.0 mm but they're 2.5s, which is perfect for Jet Skiing. Love your wetsuits !
customer_reviews.author: Tim MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Way way way too small
customer_reviews.text: Way way way too small. You will need AT LEAST 1 size larger, probably 2 (maybe 3??). I am 5'8, 170 lbs and size large according to their chart. There was a 1 foot wide gap in the back with that size. Also, if the velcro tab at the top of the zipper touches the inside of the suit (and it will), you will have some ugly tearing of the inner fabric.
customer_reviews.author: EZBZ

customer_reviews.title: Water was low 70s (which is chilly for me) and I was comfortable spending several hours in the water
customer_reviews.text: bought this for a trip down to Florida in April. Water was low 70s (which is chilly for me) and I was comfortable spending several hours in the water. I am 6'1 and 190lbs and the large fit me well. The construction seems pretty good. After 10 + uses it still looks new. Of course spraying it off with fresh water after use will help keep it looking new.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have only use the wetsuit on one trip and have been swimming and it on three different days for an hour or two each day, and was pulled behind using a innertube on the lake once. That’s I cannot speak too much to durability. But the suit fits great, I am 6 feet tall and 150 pounds and I have the medium.
customer_reviews.author: G. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is way off!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three wet suits, Cressi, Oneil and this one. All the same size (M). This suit was SO narrow in the chest and torso. When laid it on top of the others it was 2-4 inches narrower. I am 5'9 inch 165 lbs thin build and I literally couldn't zipper it. Quality looks great. I just wish it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tareyton

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I am 6’0’’ and 235lbs. I bought this in an XXL and it was way too small for me. It rubbed raw spots on my arms because they were so tight. It could have been my fault for ordering the wrong size... I don’t know if there was a size chart. I don’t think the next size up would have been much better, co wider how tight it was. Other than that, it was well made and the quality was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Irby

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Tried it in my 66 degree temp pool today and it was awesome! Works as I had hoped it would! I'm 5'9" and 200 lbs, physically fit and the size large fit was just right! More than worth the price for this one!
customer_reviews.author: NYN8TV

customer_reviews.title: shorty
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered another brand ( which ended up too small , so I gave it to my grandson ) and ordered this one . I hate the fact the back zip often would jam . I wear this for body or boggie boarding , the front zip is so easy !
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Has little rubber grabbies all over the butt, fits as described.
customer_reviews.text: Stitches are a bit thicker and robust than a typical wetsuit, sizing chart is accurate. I'm 6' 0", 165 lb and the large fits well, maybe a bit on the big side for girth, but the arms and legs are sealed well. A person of 180 would fit this suit perfectly. I would not want a medium or a large. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Love to teach

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for the normal proportioned people!
customer_reviews.text: I thought a medium would work for my medium/tall frame. It does not, it fits perfectly around the chest and waist horizontally but vertically it is too short and gives me the worst wedgie. When it is warm enough to warrent this suit I just opt for board shorts and a rash guard.
customer_reviews.author: E-Rock

customer_reviews.title: All good except the choking
customer_reviews.text: This wet-suit was comparable to a more expensive name brand in every aspect but one. The neck seal was to high for me and I felt like my adam's apple was getting squashed. Initially I didn't think it was too bad but the longer I wore it the worse it got. After 15 minutes I decided it wasn't for me and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Dave

customer_reviews.title: Look like a superhero.
customer_reviews.text: I can't recommend this enough. I bought this for a tubing trip in ~76-78 degree water. It was very easy to wear and kept me quite comfortable, though part of the trip was completely shaded and I did begin to get cold by the end. It's an improvement over using emergency blankets in previous years! The build quality is great, I have no complaints. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a warm-water shorty wetsuit. And if you wear this and it doesn't make you look awesome, you need to work on your physical fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Kept me warm when others were shivering
customer_reviews.text: I wore this in Mexico at one of those Dolphin encounter places. I was the only one wearing one besides the dolphin trainers and everyone was shivering in the water, whereas I was extremely comfortable. Keeping this for any other situations where I may encounter cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Denver family

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Why pay more for the same wetsuit? This suit fits and looks great. You could get another more expensive one, but why would you? Save a ton of Money and buy this one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W

customer_reviews.title: Follow published size chart carefully.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 1.85cm athletic build. Sizes run true as advertised. Unfortunately I bought one bit bigger (XL) following many people reviews about sizes, and trying some O’Neil’s wetsuits (which I am XL). They should make it easier to know what size you need. Also quality is not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Great Wetsuit for Spring  Sailing
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit was a gift for our grandson who was doing Spring sailing here in Florida. It was perfect. Excellent design features and and quality. Great flexibility and light weight . Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Mission Accomplished, swam and went cave diving
customer_reviews.text: This worked great. I’m 5’ll and 169lb. Was a bit snug but kept me warm so I have to give 5 stars. Was able to swim and took chill off and also helps ya float just a tad. Really looked well made and dries out fast.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Medium 5’9(1/2) 145lb
customer_reviews.text: It’s fits really well, and it’s the to right, but very form fitting. I ordered a Medium, I am 5’9(1/2) 145lb. Gave it 4 starts because some of the stitching was falling out when I received the item.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell M.

customer_reviews.title: Sizes seem way too tight, even when buying a size larger than normal
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my jet ski - generally worked well, but, the size is definitely tighter than advertised (even though I bought a size larger than normal). I know they are supposed to be tight, but, this was waaaay too tight. Otherwise, construction of the wetsuit was great. Returned due to the size issue, however.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore this in a triathlon, swim portion. He said it was great. it did compress his chest slightly too much, when swimming, but was okay. I imagine all wetsuits would do that to some extent when racing.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Spot on for American sizes
customer_reviews.text: Fit seems spot on. Ordered a 3x. I'm 5'8 255 lbs. It was a bit long in the legs and neck. Going to try a 2x next. Was warm in a pool session looks good.
customer_reviews.author: anthony chiarello

customer_reviews.title: Great wet suit
customer_reviews.text: Great wet suit. Wish the leash was a little longer, & that it was just a little warmer. Seems a little colder than 3mm wetsuits I've always rented. But good overall, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Craig C

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and comforable
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for an affordable wet suit for a while now, and this is it. It fits very comfortably and stays warm. It is tight around the edges of the sleeves and legs, but I'd imagine this is to keep water from flowing in and out. I really like this wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Be alert!
customer_reviews.text: This runs REALLY small. I bought it "big" for my 11 y.o. nephew. He can't get it zipped. Unfortunately the return window has closed. All we want to do is exchange it. Future buyers consider both size and timing. We're bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne V. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Affordable shorty
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great fit, higher quality than I expected! Was very comfortable and just what I needed for diving in tropical waters (82-85F.) I'm 5'7, 220 lb with 42ish inch waist and the LX fit well.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Rosen

customer_reviews.title: No buttox room
customer_reviews.text: There is No room in the butt. Get ready to feel like you are wearing a thong.
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: Great suit.
customer_reviews.text: My first wetsuit purchase sooo... I am 6’ and 185 lbs, 42.5 in chest, 34 in waist. I ordered the large. Initial fit felt pretty snug. Wore it to swim this morning, it fit perfectly. In the water it loosened up. XL would be too big. Initial thoughts are this is a great suit. Kept me warm, air temp 60 degrees, water temp 63 degrees. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kenton E Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Pick 1 or 2 Sizes Larger!
customer_reviews.text: After reading through most of the bad reviews, I opted for 2 sizes larger. It's a perfect fit and thoroughly enjoying this product scuba diving.
customer_reviews.author: Casual Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5'9 and 165 lb (muscly teenager) and this fit perfectly. Well constructed and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Blue

customer_reviews.title: Good price, great wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: good price, great wetsuit. I used it for snorkeling and surfing in hawaii. It is comfortable to wear and kept me from getting cold. I am 5'9" and 190 pounds. i got the X-Large. It is maybe a tiny bit too large, but i prefer that over a tiny bit too small.
customer_reviews.author: frugalbrutus

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this suit. It fits me perfectly. I’m 5’10” on the athletic side and I got a size medium. The color and style is great, it makes me feel like a super hero when I wear it
customer_reviews.author: Keshawn Warner

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what you get
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this. Made extremely well and fot exactly as described. Good price too
customer_reviews.author: michele smyers

customer_reviews.title: Neck opening too tight
customer_reviews.text: Very nice suit unfortunately the neck is too tight (makes me choke) and I will have to return it. I am surprised the neck opening is so tight on a 3XL sized suit. Everything else is good.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G Mehlin

customer_reviews.title: Fits comfortably and the smell finally wore off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wetsuit for a diving trip to the philippines. It has held up well so far after 20 dives in two weeks. Fits comfortably and the smell finally wore off.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great spring suit
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6' 250. The 3XL fits perfectly around my shoulders. It's a little loose in the waist area for me, but might be perfect if you have a bit of a belly.
customer_reviews.author: James E

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was expecting!
customer_reviews.text: It's a good suit for the price! It's certainly not a tailored fit, but it works! I bought it for raft guide training in the colorado high country - it was wet, windy, and snowy, and it kept me about as warm as I could have hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Glitzer

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The sizing grid runs small. If it says you need a Medium it may be too small and you will be charged shipping to return it. That being said the quality appears fine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TML

customer_reviews.title: I am 5'11" 190lbs and the XL was perfect. (Well
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I read the other reviews and saw that these run large. I am 5'11" 190lbs and the XL was perfect. (Well, other than I need to bulk up a bit on my arms LOL) Good, solid fit, double stitched seams, sealskin around the neck to keep the water out. Have not tried in the water yet, but hopefully this will get me some additional water time on my jetskis before it gets too biting cold to surf jump...
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and seems very well made.. I surly recommend this to others
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and seems very well made.. I surly recommend this to others
customer_reviews.author: Mo.Ra

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'2 227lbs bearing a slack athletic built with wide shoulders. What I like is it fits and I the fact I got a lg and still comfortable. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Walter James

customer_reviews.title: great fit.
customer_reviews.text: this puppy fits like a glove, is exactly as described and the sizing guide is right on. havent had it in any water yet but the 5 seconds i had it on to try it on i was burning up. has longggggg zip string for easy closure. i just dont look forward to having to pee in it though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Walker

customer_reviews.title: did not need my snorkeling vest wearing this.
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, and worked well for summer scuba and snorkel in Hawaii. arrived quickly and seems well made... no obvious wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: K. miller

customer_reviews.title: Gnarly, Rad, and every Sweet word in between.
customer_reviews.text: 5'11" and 230 post-muscle 40 year old body. Ordered a 2xl. Fit awsome... great quality for the price. Go with the black decal version, I got red and it appears they will crack and peel off easily. Made in China is only downfall.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twiceup to now. I'm very satisfied! fit snug and keeps me warm .
customer_reviews.author: stephane caron

customer_reviews.title: Good value and fit,cool bling
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in good condition, fit is generally good and appearance is fine. Neck is a bit tight but maybe I have a thick one... Shiny bits on back,butt are sort of cool and allow suit to grip smooth surface like fiberglass gunnel on my boat, nice to not slip, plus my friends say it looks very bling ...
customer_reviews.author: Ozslotguy

customer_reviews.title: Works nice.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Im 5'10 180ish. I could lose 5-10 lbs and have it fit better, but it fits like a glove right now. Worked great for skim boarding at the ocean in 64° weather.
customer_reviews.author: Hang

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, I weigh 195 and ordered XL
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, I weigh 195 and ordered XL. Should have ordered L but would have had a problem getting my belly into it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Oberlander

customer_reviews.title: keeps me warm
customer_reviews.text: bought this for flow riding, kept me vary warm and allowed me to move with no binding. I returned another brand that cost more and did not fit as well. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny R Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit is warm and comfortable. I spend 4-6 hours in a pool one day a week working and often get cold without addition of a wetsuit. This is a repeat purchase of the Phantom Aquatics Men's Marine Shorty Wetsuit since I liked the first one so much.
customer_reviews.author: Fish

customer_reviews.title: Worked fantastic. She is 5
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my mom to wear in Florida after her knee replacement surgery. Worked fantastic. She is 5, 8 about 160lb. A bit baggy around the neck but needed it a mens size after the knee replacement.great fit otherwise worked well in the cool Atlantic waters.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good qualtiy. Even better than Oneil ones
customer_reviews.text: Very good qualtiy. Even better than Oneil ones. my kids 11 years old took small adult . Little bit big. but, kids sizes are really tight. Good material
customer_reviews.author: gemstones

customer_reviews.title: Price was much better than at the local dive shops for a similar ...
customer_reviews.text: Im 5'9" 205lbs and the XL fits perfectly a little hard to get on by my self. Price was much better than at the local dive shops for a similar wetsuit. Will have to see how it holds up over time
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great for warm water
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size. Happy with the performance. A little too thin for 65 degree water, however.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Roche

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected and feels great and allows for fairly unrestricted motion
customer_reviews.text: Can you say speed suit. Fit as expected and feels great and allows for fairly unrestricted motion. It also helps me swim faster like a manshark
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: They run small
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit, returned it. I am 6' and weigh 185 with an average build. I ordered an XL and couldn't zip it up.
customer_reviews.author: AlC

customer_reviews.title: The 2XL fits fine, and as a bigger boy at 5' 9" ...
customer_reviews.text: Very stretchy. The 2XL fits fine, and as a bigger boy at 5' 9" and about 235" carrying most in my gut, it will do until I actually succeed in losing weight. Exceeded expectations for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. 38” waist 45”chest, 6’ 2XL Perfect for cenotes.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It fit as expected and comfortably. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good low prices shorty
customer_reviews.text: Use this for swimming in our pool over the winter. The pool is enclosed, we are in VA. Keep the pool at about 70-72 and this keeps me fairly warm. Good quality, use it 3-4 times a week and still holding up well. Sizing was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chilli

customer_reviews.title: Best product with reasonable price! I will buy another one.
customer_reviews.text: Best product with reasonable price! I will buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris, Buford, GA

customer_reviews.title: Large fits 6ft/190lbs
customer_reviews.text: I have not tested this in the water yet, but I will update later if I need. I am 6ft tall and 190-lbs and Size Large fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Butrovich

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved it on time. Used it on the jetski was comfortable and kept me warm in the midwest lake temperatures. Fits prefect I'm 6'1" 250 plus
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9 220lbs. Do not hesitate to buy. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sobe

customer_reviews.title: Great mobility and stylish
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new wet suit. We tried it out in Bermuda and it was perfect for him. He had better mobility in this wetsuit than some others we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: AmznUser181921

customer_reviews.title: Neck size order 1 size larger than suggested
customer_reviews.text: Size is not real accurate and rubber collar is very tight and if someone has a large neck it would be very uncomfortable Front zip is more practical and what I’ll order next time
customer_reviews.author: ROD BARKER

customer_reviews.title: Who's ready to hit the water!!
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit is AWESOME! Using it in the lakes and rivers of Colorado under my kayaking gear and it makes a HUGE difference. I can't wait to try this in key largo and Hawaii where the water is warm! Well constructed, easy to get in and out of but the sizes run a little small. I went 2x larger than the suggestion and it is a little loose, but very comfortable! I will be buying one for my wife for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Smith

customer_reviews.title: 3xl tight with 48inch chest
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'11 240, 40waist and 48inch chest. The 3XL is tight in the chest and arms. I can breath but it's a bit uncomfortable. It kept me very warm in 70degree water in the Bahamas.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: I am 6'1" at around 200 lbs. Weight lift ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'1" at around 200 lbs. Weight lift a lot and my upper body is built accordingly. This wetsuit fits perfectly. Can't wait for summer to use it.
customer_reviews.author: BigSky109

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: High quality construction. Durable and strong material. Just a little uncomfortable on the neck, maybe a design flaw or my neck being thick perhaps (don’t think so) but overall very much satisfied with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Yesid Calle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and quality. My husband and I both bought this for scuba diving in St. Lucia. We got a little chilly but it's January.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are super misleading.
customer_reviews.text: Looks high quality, but once you get it, it's clearly not of the same quality as the big names.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husband. We go cliff jumping ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. We go cliff jumping into some really cold waters. Keeps his body warm and fits him just right!
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood1985

customer_reviews.title: Nice - fits to size as expected
customer_reviews.text: Fits the same as you would buy a T-Shirt. I am 6'1" 240 and usually go for a 2XL T-shirt. I bought the 3XL - way to big - water leaking in everywhere. The 2XL is perfect. Nice looking shorty too!
customer_reviews.author: NJ Bodyboarder

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend..
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Used them and had no issues at all. Would recommend..
customer_reviews.author: Cathy & Ed

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect. I'm 5' 10" 175lbs
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. I'm 5' 10" 175lbs. I followed the sizing guide and it worked out just right. I wore this wetsuit on a recent dive trip in Hawaii.
customer_reviews.author: L Cranson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size chart, comfortable to wear on repetitive day dive and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Thierry

customer_reviews.title: this is a xl and fits well I am 6'6 and 220 lbs I tried the 3xl and the 2xl and this one fits good and I can get it on by myself
customer_reviews.text: thank you amazon .. this is a xl and fits well I am 6'6 and 220 lbs I tried the 3xl and the 2xl and this one fits good and I can get it on by myself at least when its dry this is the first wetsuit that I have bought
customer_reviews.author: G. Fortuna

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It fits me pretty good. I am surprised at the price since I did not think that this prosuct could be at this level of quality for a cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Well Made. Fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well- keeps me warm in the water. Well constructed. Sizing is sl off. Go larger otherwise you may have trouble with comfort
customer_reviews.author: George Reiss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and doesn’t choke you!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and I hate too tight things around my neck - this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Scott H

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: worked well,kept me warm. I am 6` and 190 lbs,it was a little snug in the armpits but overall it was nice
customer_reviews.author: Ian S.

customer_reviews.title: Never Leave Reviews.
customer_reviews.text: The price was right. Was surprised at both the fit and the quality. I especially like the how the neck seal attaches. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Guess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and warm. Nice fit. 5'10", 180lbs. and the large is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RAA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wet suit
customer_reviews.text: What I expected in a wet suit! First time use, 73F water temp in Bahamas, comfortably kept warm and amazingly dry. Used for snorkeling. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a great value for the money. Have only "dry fitted" it so far but the fit and finish are great. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent feel. Large size was perfect fit for me at 5'9" & 180 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

product_meta.title: Phantom Aquatics Men's Marine Shorty Wetsuit
product_meta.description: The Men's Marine Shorty from Phantom Aquatics is an exceptionally comfortable and warm suit that is cut specifically for ladies. The 2.5mm thick neoprene is stretchy to give freedom of movement and flat lock seams help improve comfort. A high friction seat on the rear helps to reduce slipping whilst seated on wet surfaces whilst reinforced shoulders add extra abrasion protection, The suit has a Neck Tab Closure with Micro-Teeth Velcro Fastener for a Comfortable Neck Closure and Reduced Water Flushing.
feature_bullets: Neck Tab with Micro-Teeth Velcro Fastener
